headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Doomsday: Best Laid Plans
content: Your Facility’s planning room is the nerve center for the Doomsday Heist. Once you’ve got a crew together and paid the setup cost, you can begin the first of the heist’s three acts. Each one involves negotiating ruthless Freemode prep missions, tactical setup operations, and a finale where, as crew leader, you will divide the sizeable profits between your associates. Once you’ve completed all three acts, they will all be available to replay.
